parameter_version: Kueri: ("Blockchain" OR "Smart Contract") AND ("Islamic Finance" OR "Sharia Compliance" OR "Islamic Banking") AND ("Akad" OR "Contract" OR "Transparency" OR "Murabahah" OR "Mudharabah") AND ( LIMIT-TO ( DOCTYPE,"ar" ) ) AND ( LIMIT-TO ( LANGUAGE,"English" ) ) AND ( LIMIT-TO ( PUBSTAGE,"final" ) ) AND ( LIMIT-TO ( SRCTYPE,"j" ) ) AND ( LIMIT-TO ( OA,"all" ) )
